job description:
Senior Data Engineer - Google Cloud
If you're looking for a new opportunity outside of the Big 4 consulting world, apply today!

What You Will Be Doing
  • Migrate data from Azure and other legacy systems to GCP
  • Run ETL jobs
  • Perform data cleansing and develop visualization dashboards
  • Create data mining project and utilize that information to increase consumer brand awareness and revenue
  • Complete data processing and analytics using programming experience to sort through large amounts of information
What You Need for this Position
  • 5+ years of analytics consulting
  • 3+ years of Google Cloud Platform
  • Technology requirements: MS Excel, SQL, Tableau, SAS, etc.
  • Minimum Bachelor's degree in mathematics, statistics or accounting
  • Web analytics, data modeling and project management experience
So, if you are an Engagement Manager with Google Cloud experience, please apply today!
  • Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

    CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
